text: The Walter Camp Football Foundation (WCFF) is one of the organizations whose College Football All-America Team is recognized by the National Collegiate Athletic Association. The organization also presents various awards. It is named in honor of football pioneer Walter Camp. ==Awards== :See footnoteAwards webpage. Walter Camp Football Foundation official website. Retrieved 2011-01-16. *Walter Camp Player of the Year *CT Player of the Year *Walter Camp Coach of the Year *Walter Camp Man of the Year *Walter Camp Alumni of the Year *Walter Camp Distinguished American Award *Joseph W. Kelly Award (high school) ==Footnotes== ==External links== *Walter Camp Football Foundation official website *Awards webpage. title: Walter Camp Football Foundation
